}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Per [http://review.kakaku.com/review/K0000614539/ a review on '''Kakaku'''], this device is using RTL8812AU <small>(and is also '''DNI''' manufactured..)</small>. :"2976466501" would seem to be silkscreened on the board.
